mapper.insert: insert into employee(emp_no, emp_pw, emp_addr, emp_tel, emp_email, emp_name, emp_posit, admin_code, dept_code) values (#{empNo}, #{empPw}, #{empAddr}, #{empTel}, #{empEmail}, #{empName}, #{empPosit}, #{adminCode}, #{deptCode})
mapper.update: update employee set emp_pw = #{empPw}, emp_addr = #{empAddr}, emp_tel = #{empTel}, emp_email = #{empEmail}, emp_name = #{empName}, emp_posit = #{empPosit}, state_Code = #{stateCode}, admin_code = #{adminCode}, dept_code = #{deptCode} where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: select AA.*, decode(BB.img_path, null, 'N','Y') as imgYn, CC.dept_name from EMPLOYEE AA left outer join IMAGE BB on AA.emp_no = BB.emp_no left outer join DEPT CC on AA.dept_code = CC.dept_code order by AA.emp_no
select emp_email as email from employee where emp_no = #{empNo}
